fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Remove an ally's shadow tonight, making their visit astral.
- Invoke an eternal night, skipping the next two day phases. It will still count as a new night each time. You may only use this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - With the Necromonicon, you can use your second ability again if you already used it. This time, it actually *will* be eternal, and it'll only end if you're killed, roleblocked, or the game ends.
